page.title: 18CLUBS AND SHOWS IN CHILMARK
page.content: Both{Chilmark and Teffont Magna}hold {annual village shows,}both self supporting financialy and with many entries for flowers, vegetables and crafts.{Open classes}were abolished during recent years, but entries are allowed fom the villages which share a school with the survey villages: Chilmark with Fonthill Bishop and Teffont with Dinton.{Pony rides, teas {stalls, skittles, raffles and spinning {demonstrations}are other attractions. {Silver cups}are awarded as well as money prizes for many events. There are a surprising number of clubs for such small villages. Chilmark has a{Womens Institute, a Mothers Union and a{Sunday Club}for teenagers. Teffont has a{Golden Club}for{retired people and a{lunch club. AMDG AMcG
